org.rendersnake

Class HtmlCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rendersnake.HtmlCanvas
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlServletCanvas, SinkCanvas

    public class HtmlCanvas
extends Object
    HtmlCanvas provide the api to write HTML elements on a io.Writer. It holds a PageContext for passing Objects to other Renderable instances.
    Author:
    e.micklei

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HtmlEscapeHandler HTML_ESCAPE_HANDLER
      The handler that can escape characters of a String for proper HTML writing.
      static int INITIAL_STACK_CAPACITY
      Configurable parameter to nested element.
      static boolean NO_ESCAPE
      Intention revealing constant to emphasize that escaping for a text item is not needed
      protected ArrayList<String> openTagStack
      Collection of written open elements to be closed.
      protected Writer out
      The writer that will collect all HTML code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlCanvas()
      Create a HtmlCanvas that writes its output on a StringWriter.
      HtmlCanvas(Writer output)
      Create a new HtmlCanvas that writes its output on Writer.

             throws IOException

      • a

        public HtmlCanvas a(CharactersWriteable attrs)
             throws IOException
        Opens the a tag, with the specified attributes.

        Close this tag by calling _a() (the end tag is required).

        This tag supports the following attributes:

        name
        named link end
        href
        URI for linked resource
        hreflang
        language code
        type
        advisory content type
        rel
        forward link types
        rev
        reverse link types
        charset
        char encoding of linked resource
        id
        document-wide unique id
        class
        space separated list of classes
        lang
        language code
        dir
        direction for weak/neutral text
        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info
        shape
        for use with client-side image maps
        coords
        for use with client-side image maps
        onclick
        a pointer button was clicked
        ondblclick
        a pointer button was double clicked
        onmousedown
        a pointer button was pressed down
        onmouseup
        a pointer button was released
        onmouseover
        a pointer was moved onto
        onmousemove
        a pointer was moved within
        onmouseout
        a pointer was moved away
        onfocus
        the element got the focus
        onblur
        the element lost the focus
        onkeypress
        a key was pressed and released
        onkeydown
        a key was pressed down
        onkeyup
        a key was released
        target
        render in this frame
        tabindex
        position in tabbing order
        accesskey
        accessibility key character
        Parameters:
        attrs - the CharactersWriteable, or null if none.
        Returns:
        the receiver, this HtmlCanvas instance.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an I/O error.

      • _a

        public HtmlCanvas _a()
              throws IOException
        Closes the a tag.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an I/O error while writing the end tag.

        @Deprecated
public HtmlCanvas applet(CharactersWriteable attrs)
                  throws IOException
        Deprecated. this tag is deprecated in HTML 4.0.
        Opens the applet tag, with the specified attributes.

        Close this tag by calling _applet() (the end tag is required).

        This tag supports the following attributes:

        codebase
        optional base URI for applet
        code
        applet class file
        name
        allows applets to find each other
        archive
        comma separated archive list
        object
        serialized applet file
        width
        initial width
        height
        initial height
        id
        document-wide unique id
        class
        space separated list of classes
        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info
        alt
        short description
        align
        vertical or horizontal alignment
        hspace
        horizontal gutter
        vspace
        vertical gutter
        Parameters:
        attrs - the CharactersWriteable, or null if none.
        Returns:
        the receiver, this HtmlCanvas instance.

        a pointer was moved within

        a pointer was moved away
        onfocus
        the element got the focus
        onblur
        the element lost the focus
        onkeypress
        a key was pressed and released
        onkeydown
        a key was pressed down
        onkeyup
        a key was released

        render in this frame

        position in tabbing order

        This tag supports the following attributes:

        name
        value
        sent to server when submitted
        type
        for use as form button
        id
        document-wide unique id
        class
        space separated list of classes
        lang
        language code
        dir
        direction for weak/neutral text
        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info
        disabled
        unavailable in this context
        accesskey
        accessibility key character
        tabindex
        position in tabbing order
        onblure
        onfocus
        the element got the focus
        onclick
        a pointer button was clicked
        ondblclick
        a pointer button was double clicked
        onmousedown
        a pointer button was pressed down
        onmouseup
        a pointer button was released
        onmouseover
        a pointer was moved onto
        onmousemove
        a pointer was moved within
        onmouseout
        a pointer was moved away
        onkeypress
        a key was pressed and released
        onkeydown
        a key was pressed down
        onkeyup
        a key was released
        Parameters:
        attrs - the CharactersWriteable, or null if none.
        Returns:
        the receiver, this HtmlCanvas instance.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an I/O error.

      • _button

        public HtmlCanvas _button()
                   throws IOException
        Closes the button tag.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an I/O error while writing the end tag.

        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info

        render in this frame

        onreset
        the form was reset
        onclick
        a pointer button was clicked
        ondblclick
        a pointer button was double clicked
        onmousedown
        a pointer button was pressed down
        onmouseup
        a pointer button was released
        onmouseover
        a pointer was moved onto
        onmousemove
        a pointer was moved within
        onmouseout
        a pointer was moved away

        a key was pressed and released

        a key was pressed down

      • frame

        public HtmlCanvas frame(CharactersWriteable attrs)
                 throws IOException
        Opens the frame tag, with the specified attributes.

        This tag must not be closed, an end tag is forbidden.

        This tag supports the following attributes:

        name
        name of frame for targetting
        longdesc
        link to long description (complements title)
        src
        source of frame content
        noresize
        allow users to resize frames?
        scrolling
        scrollbar or none
        frameborder
        request frame borders?
        margin-width
        margin-height
        id
        document-wide unique id
        class
        space separated list of classes
        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info
        Parameters:
        attrs - the CharactersWriteable, or null if none.
        Returns:
        the receiver, this HtmlCanvas instance.

      • frameset

        public HtmlCanvas frameset(CharactersWriteable attrs)
                    throws IOException
        Opens the frameset tag, with the specified attributes.

        Close this tag by calling _frameset() (the end tag is required).

        This tag supports the following attributes:

        rows
        list of lengths, default: 100% (1 row)
        cols
        list of lengths, default: 100% (1 col)
        id
        document-wide unique id
        class
        space separated list of classes
        title
        advisory title
        style
        associated style info
        onload
        all the frames have been loaded
        onunload
        all the frames have been removed
        Parameters:
        attrs - the CharactersWriteable, or null if none.
        Returns:
